span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 更改，修正： to look over again in order to correct or improve
【例】 There are many problems involved in revising a dictionary. 修正字典会牵涉到诸多问题。‖With the snow, we'll need to revise our travel plans. 因为下雪了，我们不得不更改旅游计划。
【近】 amend, correct, emend, polish, redraft, refine, rework, upgrade
【反】 discard 丢弃，抛弃
【派】 revision n. 修改

【记】 re重新 + devise 设计，重新设计
There is nothing permanent except change. 唯有变化是永恒。
